actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a contract for the construction of facilities at the Navajo Academy of the Navajo Reservation.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a self-determination contract with the Navajo Academy, Inc. in connection with the acquisition, construction, and equipping of facilities for such Academy on the Navajo Reservation for a residential college preparatory high school for gifted Native Americans. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a contract for the construction of facilities at the Navajo Academy of the Navajo Reservation.
